respond_message.label: Chat Message
respond_message.tooltip: The message that the bot will display when the command is triggered.

channel_chance.label: Percentage
channel_chance.tooltip: The percentage chance if the bot meows to the channel owner.

announcer_timer.label: Interval (min)
announcer_timer.tooltip: The amount of minutes it takes before the meow will be triggered.

file_sound.label: Sound file
file_sound.tooltip: Name of the file that must be played. (Must be located in the audio folder!)

silverback_nomeow.label: Don't meow to ocbsilverback
silverback_nomeow.tooltip: The bot shall never ever meow to the Twitch user ocb_silverback
